dict.string: Our app uses bluetooth to find, connect and transfer data between the treadmill/bike and 3rd app like Zwift. The connection is always required.
Our app uses bluetooth to find, connect and transfer data between the treadmill/bike and 3rd app like Zwift
application needs Documents access in order to save logs and gpx file for the training sessions
This app will need access to the local network for Discovery services (Wahoo Fitness Direct Connect).
Location service are used to give access to bluetooth peripheral.
